Generate a shareable link that anyone can use to send you a friend request. Link expires in 7 days and can be used up to 10 times.

Analytics will appear here once you start getting traffic
We collect only aggregated, anonymized data. No IP addresses, no cookies, no user tracking. Session IDs are random and not tied to individuals. Referrer data shows only domains, not full URLs.
Track organizing metrics, campaign performance, and make data-driven decisions
Admin access required to view security anomalies
Monitor suspicious behavior patterns to identify potential infiltrators
Honeypots are hidden documents or features that only infiltrators or bad actors would access. They appear as \"sensitive\" information to attract suspicious users.
Survey questions that identify bad actors
Immediate investigation required. These patterns indicate potential infiltration or data harvesting.
Monitors bulk data downloads and exports
Hidden sensitive documents that only infiltrators access
Detects rapid viewing of member profiles or documents
Flags users building social graphs too quickly
Identifies spam-like or divisive posting patterns
Your reactions won\'t be visible to others
Your vote will be cryptographically sealed
You can change your vote until the proposal closes.
Your identity is protected by zero-knowledge cryptography
Your anonymous vote has been cryptographically sealed and recorded.
Your public vote has been cryptographically sealed and recorded.

This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to this device.
Write down these words and store them securely offline. Anyone with this phrase can access your account.
Your account is not backed up. Save your recovery phrase to prevent losing access.
This password will encrypt your imported key locally.
Minimum 8 characters. This password encrypts your private keys.
Password must be at least 8 characters
Your private key will be encrypted with this password. It never leaves your device unencrypted.
Identity is locked. Please unlock first to view your recovery phrase.
BuildIt has no server-side password recovery. Your recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your account if you forget your password.
Anyone with this phrase can access your account. Store it securely offline and never share it.
Write down these 24 words and store them securely. This is your only way to recover your account.
You haven\'t created a backup for this account. If you logout and forget your password, you may permanently lose access.
I have written down my recovery phrase and stored it in a secure location. I understand that if I lose this phrase, I will permanently lose access to my account.
Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
Welcome, %s! Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
Recovery failed. Please check your recovery phrase.
Please enter a valid 24-word recovery phrase.
Create a new password to protect your account on this device.
Password must be at least 8 characters
This password encrypts your private key on this device. If you forget it, you will need your recovery phrase again.
Enter your 24-word recovery phrase to reset your password and recover access to your account.
Enter the 24-word recovery phrase for \"%s\" to set a new password.
Your recovery phrase is never sent to any server. It is only used locally to derive your private key.
Your account has been recovered and you are now logged in.
One or more words are incorrect. Please check your recovery phrase and try again.
Enter the requested words from your recovery phrase to confirm you have saved it correctly.
Can\'t remember? Go back to view your recovery phrase again, but make sure to write it down this time!
This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to your device. There is NO password reset. Write it down and store it securely offline.

You\'re at the highest engagement level! Keep building the movement.
The Engagement Ladder is based on the Spectrum of Support methodology used by successful organizing movements. Each level represents deeper involvement in the movement:
Complete milestones at your current level to unlock the next stage of your organizing journey.
Active Support (70%%) - Actively participating in actions
Core Organizer (100%%) - Leading and developing others
Passive Support (40%%) - Supporting from the sidelines
Track your engagement, complete milestones, and grow as an organizer

These security features are essential for:
Infiltration is not paranoia - it\'s a documented tactic used against organizing efforts throughout history. These tools provide systematic defense without creating a culture of suspicion.
Detect landlord-sponsored bad actors attempting to disrupt organizing
Prevent employer infiltration during organizing drives
Protect sources from corporate or government surveillance

High-risk organizing campaigns face constant threats from infiltrators, bad actors, and surveillance. These security features help identify and prevent malicious activity while maintaining trust within the community.
